com.beaglebuddy.mp3
Class MP3Base

java.lang.Object
  com.beaglebuddy.mp3.MP3Base
Direct Known Subclasses:
MP3
public class MP3Base
extends java.lang.Object

This base class provides some underlying methods that help make the derived MP3 class's interface much cleaner and easier to understand. Thus, this class provides lower level methods that are used by the MP3 class, but would otherwise clutter the MP3 class's public interface.

public MP3Base(java.lang.String mp3File)
        throws java.io.IOException,
               ID3v23InvalidFrameException
constructor.

Parameters:
mp3File - path to the .mp3 file from which to get information.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is a problem reading the .mp3 file.
ID3v23InvalidFrameException - if the data in the ID3v2.3 tag is not valid.

Parameters:
frameType - ID3v2.3 frame type.
Returns:

getAttachedPictureFrame

protected ID3v23Frame getAttachedPictureFrame(PictureType pictureType)
                                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
gets the ID3 V2.3 frame containing the attached picture of the specified picture type.

Parameters:
pictureType - One of the 21 allowable ID3v2.3 picture types.
Returns:
the ID3 V2.3 frame containing the attached picture of the specified picture type. If no picture with the specified picture type have been specified, then null is returned.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the picture type is not a valid ID3V2.3 picture type.

setAttachedPicture

protected void setAttachedPicture(PictureType pictureType,
                                  java.io.File imageFile)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
sets the attached picture for the specified picture type.

Parameters:
pictureType - one of the 21 valid ID3v2.3 picture types.
imageFile - image file to attach.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the picture type is not a valid ID3V2.3 picture type.
java.io.IOException - if the specified image file can not be read.

setAttachedPicture

protected void setAttachedPicture(java.lang.String mimeType,
                                  PictureType pictureType,
                                  byte[] image)
                           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
sets the attached picture for the specified picture type.

Parameters:
mimeType - MIME type of the image.
pictureType - one of the 21 valid ID3v2.3 picture types.
image - raw binary bytes of the actual image.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the picture type is not a valid ID3V2.3 picture type.

getComments

protected java.lang.String getComments(Language language)
                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
gets the comments about the song in the specified language.

Parameters:
language - the ISO-639-2 language code of the language the comments about the song are written in.
Returns:
the comments about the song in the specified language. If no comments about the song in the specified language have been specified, then null is returned.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified language is not a valid ISO-639-2 language code.

                           java.lang.String comments)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
sets the comments about the song in the specified language encoded as a UTF-16 string.

Parameters:
language - the ISO-639-2 language code of the language the comments about the song are written in.
comments - the comments about the song.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified language is not a valid ISO-639-2 language code or if the comments are empty.

Parameters:
language - the ISO-639-2 language code of the language the comments about the song are written in.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified language is not a valid ISO-639-2 language code.

Parameters:
genre - integer value of the ID3v1 genre.
Returns:
the genre as a string.

setPopularimiter

public void setPopularimiter(int rating)
sets the rating of the song.

Parameters:
rating - the rating of the song where 1 is worst and 255 is best. 0 is unknown.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the rating is not between 0 and 255, inclusive. That is, 0 <= rating <= 255.

getTextAsInteger

public int getTextAsInteger(FrameType frameType)
gets the text from a text frame and converts it to an integer.

Parameters:
frameType - ID3v2.3 text frame type. if no track number has been specified, then 0 is returned.
Returns:
the text of a text frame as an integer.

setText

protected void setText(java.lang.String text,
                       FrameType frameType)
sets the text in a text frame using ISO 8859-1 encoding.

Parameters:
text - the text of the frame to set.
frameType - ID3v2.3 text frame type.

setText

protected void setText(Encoding encoding,
                       java.lang.String text,
                       FrameType frameType)
sets the text in a text frame using the specified encoding.

Parameters:
encoding - the character set used to encode the text. Only ISO 8859-1 and UTF-16 are allowed.
text - the text of the frame to set.
frameType - ID3v2.3 text frame type.

setText

public void setText(int n,
                    FrameType frameType)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
sets the text in a text frame where the text is an integer string.

Parameters:
n - the integer to be converted to text and stored in a text frame.
frameType - ID3v2.3 text frame type.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the track number is <= 0.

getUnsynchronizedLyrics

protected java.lang.String getUnsynchronizedLyrics(Language language)
                                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
gets the unsynchronized lyrics in the specified language to the song.

Parameters:
language - the ISO-639-2 language code of the language the lyrics to the song are written in.
Returns:
the lyrics to the song in the specified language. If no lyrics in the specified language have been specified, then null is returned.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified language is not a valid ISO-639-2 language code.

setUnsynchronizedLyrics

protected void setUnsynchronizedLyrics(java.lang.String lyrics)
sets the unsynchronized (english) lyrics to the song encoded using the ISO 8859-1 character set.

Parameters:
lyrics - the lyrics to the song.

setUnsynchronizedLyrics

protected void setUnsynchronizedLyrics(Encoding encoding,
                                       Language language,
                                       java.lang.String lyrics)
                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
sets the unsynchronized lyrics.

Parameters:
encoding - the character set used to encode the lyrics. Only ISO 8859-1 and UTF-16 are allowed.
language - the ISO-639-2 language code of the language the lyrics to the song are written in.
lyrics - the lyrics to the song.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified language is not a valid ISO-639-2 language code.

removeUnsynchronizedLyrics

protected void removeUnsynchronizedLyrics(Language language)
                                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
removes the unsynchronized lyrics to the song in the specified language from the ID3 V2.3 tag.

Parameters:
language - the ISO-639-2 language code of the language the lyrics to the song are written in.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified language is not a valid ISO-639-2 language code.

save

public void save()
          throws java.io.IOException
save the ID3v2.3 tag to the .mp3 file. This is a very messy method, and you really have to understand the ID3v2.3 structure to understand this method. So, if you can, by all means, avoid reading the code in this method.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there was an error writing the ID3v2.3 tag to the .mp3 file.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
string representation of the mp3 file.
